snippet.title: NEC PC 98 (Japanese) Lemmings Gameplay all fun levels emulated
snippet.description:
Some graphical corruption on the UI but this was the best I could manage on the Neko Project emulator. Here I play all the first 20 fun levels with a few great schoolboy errors. I love Lemmings and this was my first playthrough on the PC 98 version as I aim to collect and play all versions.

This is a very good port, audio and graphics are great and compare favourably to my love for the original Amiga version.

Some videos of this on YT emulated have more graphical issues so I hope some of you enjoy this recording. Not played like a wizard but hope it gives you a look and feel for it.
